about_the_game:
Woo Wop Da Bam is a battle royale game where the player uses flying cars that emit barriers to crash other players.

What does Woo Wop Da Bam mean? Well, the internet will tell you it is a Chicago slang for the term "whatever", but it was used as a replacement for the phrase "All of a Sudden" where the developer grew up. I felt it fitting that a game having flying cars suddenly smacking into walls at high speed have a name like Woo Wop Da Bam

name: Woo Wop Da Bam

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060-6GB or AMD RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
